self-driving multi-scale imaging

multiScale_main module

class multiScale_main.MultiScale_Microscope_Controller

Bases: object

This is the controller in an MVC-scheme for mediating the interaction between the View (GUI) and the model (multiScope.py). Use: https://www.python-course.eu/tkinter_events_binds.php

__init__()
abort_stack(event)

set flag to abort stack acquisition

abort_timelapse(event)
acquire_stack(event)

start a stack acquisition thread

acquire_stack_task()

acquire a stack acquisition - processes in thread (to not stop GUI from working)

acquire_timelapse(event)

start a time-lapse acquisition thread, called from GUI (otherwise it freezes)

changeROI(event)

change the ROI - options (‘Full Chip’, ‘1024x1024’, ‘512x512’, ‘256x256’, ‘Custom’)

Returns:

changefilter(event, laser)

changes the filter to the specified one by the laser active

close()
disable_keyboard_movement(event)
enable_keyboard_movement(event)
key_pressed(event)
movestage(var, indx, mode)

moves the stage to a certain position

movestageToPosition(event)

moves the stage to a saved position, indicated by a field in the GUI

run()

Run the Tkinter Gui in the main loop :return:

run_highrespreview(event)

Runs the execution of a high resolution preview. Required: change mirror, set exposure time, start preview, set continue_preview_highres to True.

run_lowrespreview(event)

Runs the execution of a low resolution preview. Required: change mirror, start preview, set continue_preview_highres to True.

run_stop_preview(event)

Stops an executing preview and resets the profile of the preview buttons that were sunken after starting a preview

run_timelapse()

thread that controls time-lapse, started from function acquire_timelapse, which is called from GUI(self, event):

updateDriftCorrectionSettings(var, indx, mode)

update settings of the drift correction :return: settings updated in model

updateExposureParameters(var, indx, mode)
updateGUItext()

update text labes in GUI here :return:

updateHighResLaserParameters(var, indx, mode)

update the laser power

updateLowResLaserParameters(var, indx, mode)

update the laser power

update_ASLMParameters(var, indx, mode)
update_stack_aq_parameters(var, indx, mode)
updatefilename()

construct the filename used to save data, based on the information from the GUI

updatepreview(var, indx, mode)

Updates preview functionalities: auto-scaling of intensity values
